Articles.Content:
I am somewhat a texture artist, developing my skills in FSX before coming into KSP. I can do the main, speculars, bumps, alphas etc, and I know my way around CFGs too. What I cannot do is model.

Wondering if there's anyone out there who'd be able to help me in making a parts pack, who is proficient/confident enough with;

  • Modelling
  • UV maps
  • IVAs
I'm not the best modeller, but I can make models and UV maps. Contact me on skype strandkokken if you are interested.
What kind of models are you looking to make? I might be able to help.
Engines, tanks and perhaps some animated parts.
I have some sketches. I shall smarten them up a little before presenting them.
